goalSetting.title: Beha Sepheo sa Hao sa Pele
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Leeto le leng le le leng le hloka sebaka sa ho fihla. Ke sepheo sa hau sa pele sa lichelete sefe se seholo?
goalSetting.instruction: Khetha e 'ngoe ho qala. U ka e fetola hamorao.
goalSetting.customPlaceholder: Kenya chelete ea hau ea sepheo

goals.retirement: Qala Chelete ea Ka ea Ho Tsoa Mosebetsing

goalSet.title: Sepheo se Behiloe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Hantle! U behile sepheo sa hau ho {{amount}} bakeng sa {{goalTitle}}. Ha re qale ho ithuta ka mokhoa oa chelete e kopaneng!

simulate.title: Etsa mohlala
simulate.subtitle: Bona kamoo chelete ea hau e ka holang/kunyamehang ka nako
simulate.conservativeDesc: Kotsi e nyane, meputso e tsitsitseng
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Kotsi e phahameng, meputso e phahameng e ka bang teng
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Tefo e nyane haholo ho lefa mokoloto kapa nako e felile ka chelete e setseng:
simulate.add200Desc: Lefa R200 e eketsehileng khoeli le khoeli ho fokotsa moputso le likhoeli.
simulate.add500Desc: Lefa R500 e eketsehileng khoeli le khoeli ho lefa ka potlako.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Phatlalatsa tefo ea hau ho R100 e latelang.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Etsa tefo e lekanang le e 'ngoe e eketsehileng ea khoeli le khoeli ka selemo.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Chelete ea hau e ka holang ho feta ho pharalla ha monehelo oa hau ka nt≈°etso-pele e kopaneng!
simulate.timeInsight: Ka {{years}} lilemo, u fa moputso o kopaneng nako e lekaneng ho sebetsa.
simulate.contributionInsight: Mosebetsi o motle! Ho kenya R{{amount}} khoeli le khoeli ho u beha tseleng e matla ea ho fihlella maikemisetso a hau.
simulate.debtInsight: Ho eketsa tefo ea hau ka le ho le mong feela o ka fokotsa haholo likhoeli tsa ho lefa le ho fokotsa moputso o feletseng.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Poloko: moputso oa selemo o tloaela ho eketseha ha chelete e holang (e kopaneng).
simulate.debtTableHint: Mokoloto: moputso oa selemo o tloaela ho fokotsa ha chelete ea mantlha e lefshoa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Sena ke mohlala o bonolo bakeng sa litlhahiso tsa thuto. Meputso ea 'nete e ka fapana haholo ka lebaka la phetoho ea mmaraka, melemo le lintlha tse ling. T≈°ebetso ea khale ha e tiise liphello tsa bokamoso.
simulate.chartError: Karolo ea chata e hlolehile ho bont≈°'a. Sena se etsahala hangata ha module ea motheo ea react-native-svg e sa hokahane/e sa kenngoe ho thehoa ha sesebelisoa. U ntse u ka sebelisa simulator ntle le chata.
simulate.chartFixTips: Maano a ho lokisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, ebe u hloekisa & u haha hape. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, ebe u haha hape.
simulate.investmentProjectionData: Lintlha tsa mohlala oa ho kenya chelete
simulate.scenarioProjection: Mohlala ona oa {{scenarioName}} o bonts'a moputso oa selemo oa {{returnRate}}% o kopaneng khoeli le khoeli. Ka lintlha tsa hau tsa hona joale ka holimo ho {{years}} {{yearUnit}}, kakaretso ea hau e hlalosang e tla ba {{total}} e leng {{growth}} nt≈°etso-pele e kopaneng.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Se se bolelang: Mokhoa oa {{scenarioName}} o lebisitse ho ka bang {{returnRate}}% ka selemo ka kakaretso ka linako tse telele, o amohela phetoho ea {{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Meputso ea 'nete e fapane; sena ha se tiisetso. E sebelise ho utloisisa kamoo sekhahla le nako li fetolang liphello.
